duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the kitchen, preparation, and presentation of foods by chefs, cooks and other team members, ensuring adherence to culinary standards
Hire, orientate and train team members to maintain quality standards
Create and manage production team member schedules and order food/kitchen supplies
Maintain inventory of food and non-food supplies, minimize waste and theft
Project annual food and labor costs, monitor financial results, and handle food preparation issues
Plan and supervise special events, and handle any food preparation issues
